  • Method Details

    • AddPartsWindow

      public void AddPartsWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method sends the user to the Add Parts Window. Passes information to inform partsModify window that new data is being added.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This triggers when the addPartsButton is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • modifyPartsWindow

      public void modifyPartsWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method sends the user to the Modify Parts Window. Passes selected Part object to have data manipulated and modified, as well as information to inform partsModify window that old data is being modified.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This triggers when the modifyPartsButton is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • deletePartCommand

      public void deletePartCommand(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a part. Selects highlighted part from cursor and runs a confirmation window before calling the deletePart from the Inventory class.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This triggers when the deletePartButton is pressed

    • closeProgram

      public void closeProgram(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method to closes the window. Closes the window upon button press of the exitButton button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This triggers when the exit button is pressed.

    • addProductsWindow

      public void addProductsWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method sends the user to the add product screen. Passes information to the products-window to inform it that a product is being added.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This triggers when the addProducts button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteProductCommand

      public void deleteProductCommand(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a product. Obtains the product selected in the Products Table and removes product. Carries out a check to determine whether the selected product has any associated parts before deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This triggers when the deleteProduct button is pressed.

    • modifyProductsWindow

      public void modifyProductsWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method sends the user to the modify products screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This event triggers when the modifyProduct button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • searchPart

      public void searchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method displays parts that fall under the search criteria. Text from the searchPartField is scraped and determined to either be an integer or a string. This data is then passed to the lookupPart function from the Inventory class which then returns the necessary parts to be displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This event is triggered when the user presses the Enter key in the searchPartField.

    • searchProduct

      public void searchProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method displays products that fall under the search criteria. Text from the searchProductField is scraped and determined to be either an integer or a string. This data is then passed to the lookupProduct function from the Inventory class, which then returns the necessary products to be displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This event triggers when the user presses the Enter key in the searchProductField.
